amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to lobby in contravention of section 1913 of title 18, United States Code, on behalf of the proposed rule entitled "Definition of Waters of the United States' Under the Clean Water Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by EPA to lobby on behalf of the waters of the U.S. rule, in violation of the Anti-Lobbying Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Walberg.
